Articles.Content:
There are times when I may have 6 or more Kerbals on a crew and they are a mix of pilots, engineers and scientists. Is there anyone who would be willing to create a mod that would allow a person to see a list of all the Kerbals that are part of the crew, their profession, location and the ability to have them EVA or transfer to another compartment. I know Kerbal Crew Manifest does some of this, but I think it may have more features than I need, and may not have the basic feature I'm looking for.

A quick mock up looks like this:

Jebediah Kerman Pilot Mk 1-2 Command Module [EVA] [TRANSFER]

Bill Kerman Engineer Mk 2 Lander Can [EVA] [TRANSFER]

Bob Kerman Scientist Mobile Processing Lab [EVA] [TRANSFER]

I'm not even that hung up on the transfer button as I could do that by clicking on the appropriate crew door once I locate the Kerbal I'm looking for.

Thanks
I'd really like to just have the profession and level show up on the crew portraits, and right-click menus when on EVA.

> 
> I'd really like to just have the profession and level show up on the crew portraits, and right-click menus when on EVA.

I was caught out by this earlier today on my career game, and ended up making use of the fact that KIS shows the profession in its inventory window for a crew member.

Interestingly I was just looking to see if I can add the profession or the profession icon (ooh, pretty icon) to KeepFit, and noticed looking through the API that there's a lot of interesting stuff now inside ProtoCrewMember for someone to provide access to, as I'm not sure the stock UI shows it anywhere that I've noticed.

edit to add : boo - looks like none of the ExperienceTrait configs have an icon set.
